title: Soulcatcher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Gather Souls (Night): Choose two players. You will reap the souls of these players if they die tonight.
- Unleash (Night): Choose a number of players equal to the number of souls you have gathered. You will learn their roles.
- Bind (Day, 1 use): Choose a player. They will gain Basic Defense for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be told how many souls you have gathered at the start of each night.
- Any abilities that interact with dead players will fail if they target a player whose soul you gathered.

desc:
Post 1088
*Without a soul, can you really call yourself human?*
